org.apache.accumulo.server.security.delegation

Class ZooAuthenticationKeyDistributor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.server.security.delegation.ZooAuthenticationKeyDistributor

  • public class ZooAuthenticationKeyDistributor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages distribution of AuthenticationKeys, Accumulo's secret in the delegation token model, to other Accumulo nodes via ZooKeeper.
Shall be called with ZooReaderWriter, AuthenticationTokenKeyManager.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      • advertise

        public void advertise(AuthenticationKey newKey)
               throws KeeperException,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        Add the given AuthenticationKey to ZooKeeper.
        Parameters:
        newKey - The key to add to ZooKeeper
        Throws:
        KeeperException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • remove

        public void remove(AuthenticationKey key)
            throws KeeperException,
                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Remove the given AuthenticationKey from ZooKeeper. If the node for the provided key doesn't exist in ZooKeeper, a warning is printed but an error is not thrown. Since there is only a single process managing ZooKeeper at one time, any inconsistencies should be client error.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to remove from ZooKeeper
        Throws:
        KeeperException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
